sentences.en: a promise to broaden access to higher education
sentences.cn: 拓宽高等教育渠道的承诺

sentences.en: At the same time broaden the spectrum as result of energy loss fluctuations.
sentences.cn: 与此同时,电子谱由于能量损失的涨落而展宽.

sentences.en: Dictionaries can broaden people's knowledge of a language and guide them to use words more effectively.
sentences.cn: 字典更能增广人们对某种语言的知识,并引导他们有效地使用文字.

sentences.en: Flynn’s appeal broadened as the campaign continued into the summer months.
sentences.cn: 随着这场运动持续到夏季，弗林的号召力也扩大了。

sentences.en: Good novels broaden your horizons.
sentences.cn: 好小说开阔人的眼界.

sentences.en: I thought you wanted to broaden your horizons.
sentences.cn: 我想你是想拓宽自己的视野。

sentences.en: I want to broaden the discussion to other aspects of the problem.
sentences.cn: 我想将讨论范围扩展到这个问题的其他方面。

sentences.en: I’d like to work abroad to broaden my horizons (=  learn, experience, or attempt new things  ) .
sentences.cn: 我想去国外工作，开阔眼界。

sentences.en: It can broaden horizons and lead to a healthy realignment of priorities.
sentences.cn: 改行能够拓宽视野,促使人们重新评估各方面的重要性,活得更加健康.

sentences.en: Let's broaden out the discussion to talk about education as a whole.
sentences.cn: 我们来扩大一下讨论范围,全面谈谈桝育问题.

sentences.en: Mark’s smile broadened.
sentences.cn: 马克笑得更加灿烂了。

sentences.en: Mr Mates said the party must broaden its appeal to younger voters.
sentences.cn: 梅茨先生说该党必须扩大在年轻选民中的影响。

sentences.en: My effort to broaden the President's choices involved unusual bureaucratic difficulties.
sentences.cn: 我努力让总统有更大的选择余地,这在官僚机构中碰到了非凡的困难.

sentences.en: Please do what you can to broaden sales.
sentences.cn: 请尽力扩大销路.

sentences.en: Reading and traveling broaden the mind.
sentences.cn: 读书和旅行使人开阔心胸.

sentences.en: The council decided to broaden the pavement.
sentences.cn: 地方议会决定拓宽人行道。

sentences.en: The course helps school-leavers broaden their knowledge of the world of work.
sentences.cn: 这门课程有助于毕业生增加对职场的了解。

sentences.en: The two sides agreed that it is desirable to broaden the understanding between the two peoples.
sentences.cn: 双方同意,扩大两国人民之间的了解是可取的.

sentences.en: Travel broadens the mind (=  helps you to understand and accept other people’s beliefs, customs etc  ) .
sentences.cn: 旅行使人胸襟开阔。

sentences.en: We broaden in experiences by traveling.
sentences.cn: 旅行增长我们的经验.

sentences.en: We'll broaden the discussion out in a minute.
sentences.cn: 我们马上要扩大讨论的范围。

sentences.en: We've got to broaden our scope.
sentences.cn: 咱们应当扩大一下眼界.

sentences.en: You should broaden your experience by travelling more.
sentences.cn: 你应该多到各地走走以增广见识.
